description: Ragnar got his name from a Nordic legend, and this week's update brings to MO30 all the passion of the Vikings! Ragnar is another of our models who has done this type of thing before. The slit on the huge helmet head of his dick was grinning back at us almost as brightly as that huge smile that never left his face. When he finally let go, he turned and sprayed so much cum on the love seat, we are still to this day finding evidence of Ragnar's visit on the upholstery.
title: Viking Vice, Scene #02
